concept.title: AWS Credentials
concept.shortdesc: When Data Collector writes data to Kinesis Firehose, it must pass AWS credentials to Firehose.

conbody.p: find out if this is true for all Amazon stages, and add same topic there.Kinesis Firehose destinationcredentialsAWS credentialsKinesis FirehoseUse one of the following methods to pass AWS credentials to Kinesis Firehose:

dlentry.dd: When Data Collector runs on an Amazon EC2 instance, you can use the AWS Management Console to configure an IAM role for the EC2 instance. Data Collector uses the IAM instance profile credentials to automatically connect to Firehose. For more information about assigning an IAM role to an EC2 instance, see the Amazon EC2 documentation.

dd.p: When Data Collector does not run on an Amazon EC2 instance or when the EC2 instance doesnâ€™t have an IAM role, you must specify the Access Key ID and Secret Access Key properties in the Kinesis Firehose destination.
